name: The Living Deep
description:
Controls: Arrow keys to move, Z to jump, X to dash

Explore the cave, collect abilities, and escape this living cave as it shifts around you to hinder your escape.

Programing by Anthony Hanson (https://nanthno.itch.io/)

Art by Anastasia Walton

Music by Sarah J. Strachan (www.sjsmusic.com.au)

(note, the music may sound glitchy in browser. If so, please download the desktop version)
